text: The publication's explosive report claims Justin was spotted riding his motorbike around New York City without his wife. An insider close to the couple told the publication,'He's the happiest man in Manhattan, while Jen chooses to stay primarily in sunny LA.'' It's a long distance marriage,'they add. Getty Life & Style reports that the days leading up to Jen's 49th birthday on February 11 was when the couple's relationship came crumbling down. The publication claims to have exclusively learned that Jen feared Justin intended to break up with her on her big day, with a source revealing :'He'd arranged to throw Jen a small, intimate party and hang around for a few days before heading right back to New York.'And Jen thought he had plans to quietly file
